name: Still alive (itch) (Odem)
description:
This is my third game that I want to finish before the end of this year. 

Here you have to fight for life in the car, trying to stay in the zone. The game requires that the opponents (friends / people) be on the same network as the server, and  the server shouldn't to distribute the Internet. 

(PVP mode is not working well yet, please play in free mode)
